data.eml:eml: Tenebriochernes, a new genus and species of Chernetidae (Arachnida: Pseudoscorpiones) from north-western Colombia, with ecological observations

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bedoya-Roqueme, Edwin, Torres, Richard A. (2019): Tenebriochernes, a new genus and species of Chernetidae (Arachnida: Pseudoscorpiones) from north-western Colombia, with ecological observations. Zootaxa 4624 (1): 87-107, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4624.1.6
